title: General Romantic Hospital
description: A medical drama that admits TV doctors are far superior to the real thing. They have much better hair, drive cooler cars, and always have time to discuss their emotions in the hospital cafeteria.
quote: Nurse, if we are to work closely together as medical professionals, there’s something between us that must be removed… the patient.
altHero: doctor and nurse with their hands inside a patient
alt1: doctor casually sitting on a table in the cafeteria holding a cup of coffee
alt2: doctor leaning in toward a scrub nurse holding a tray of organs
alt3: doctor having an x-ray of his heart
alt4: doctor and nurse in a passionate kiss
